articles.author: Doc Louallen
articles.title: Some Americans aren't tipping enough, Pew Research poll finds - USA TODAY
articles.description: A Pew Research Center poll of 12,000 people shows that most Americans tip 15% or less for a typical sit-down meal.
articles.content:
A new poll shows that when it comes to tipping, many Americans are shortchanging their servers.
The Pew Research Center poll of 12,000 people, which came out on Thursday, shows that 57 percent of Am… [+2830 chars]
